about_the_game:
For 30 contiguous days, The Etherian Gem Miners will deliver 100 gems once per day when you login to Dungeon Defenders II.

Upon loading into the town or a map, you will receive a notification of your delivery of gems for that 24 hour period.

Remember that you have to log in daily to claim your rewards and reap the maximum value! If you remember to log in every day, you'll end up with 3000 gems total!
detailed_description:
For 30 contiguous days, The Etherian Gem Miners will deliver 100 gems once per day when you login to Dungeon Defenders II.

Upon loading into the town or a map, you will receive a notification of your delivery of gems for that 24 hour period.

Remember that you have to log in daily to claim your rewards and reap the maximum value! If you remember to log in every day, you'll end up with 3000 gems total!

name: Dungeon Defenders II - Cupid's Etherian Gem Mine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play. Integrated graphics chips are not recommended.

Upon loading into the town or a map, you will receive a notification of your delivery of gems for that 24 hour period.Remember that you have to log in daily to claim your rewards and reap the maximum value!
